channel.title: Autotyper with play sound and/or opentrade function!
channel.description:
Omg this is a long time ago i visited mopar, i was like almost forgotten this site. To appolagize me i just wanne post this script i made long ago. It's an autotyper that will play a sound and opens a trade when a trade has been found (both ot 1 of those 2). I used SendText in my script because TypeSend; doesn't types numbers for me (also not : > : is a /) so yea, maybe other ppl has got this problem 2?? However, if you wanne use TypeSend; (when you haven't got any problems with it ofcource :)) you just change "SendText" into "TypeSend" and change the "TypeByte(13);" that comes after it in every msg procedure. I hope you guys read this before posting things like: "Use typeSend noob, it's a lot og better." :D
Have fun and post comments/bugs/proggys...
Greetz
The scar noob

item.title: Autotyper with play sound and/or opentrade function!
item.dc:creator: @the_scar_noob the scar noob
item.description:
@the_scar_noob wrote:

Omg this is a long time ago i visited mopar, i was like almost forgotten this site.
To appolagize me i just wanne post this script i made long ago.
It’s an autotyper that will play a sound and opens a trade when a trade has been found (both ot 1 of those 2).
I used SendText in my script because TypeSend; doesn’t types numbers for me (also not : > : is a /) so yea, maybe other ppl has got this problem 2??
However, if you wanne use TypeSend; (when you haven’t got any problems with it ofcource :)) you just change “SendText” into “TypeSend” and change the “TypeByte(13);” that comes after it in every msg procedure.
I hope you guys read this before posting things like: “Use typeSend noob, it’s a lot og better.”

Have fun and post comments/bugs/proggys…

Greetz

The scar noob
